<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 9"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Spellender](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1092)
</title>

<spoilers>May contain spoilers from Strength of Thousands</spoilers>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #170: Spoken on the Song Wind](/Sources.aspx?ID=97) pg. 76</row>

**Price** 600 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This knife is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [returning](/Equipment.aspx?ID=301) [dagger](/Weapons.aspx?ID=3)_ with a wide blade and thick wooden handle. A prayer for protection from evil magic is carved into the handle in tiny script, running around the handle in a spiral. The grooves of the carved prayer provide a good grip on the knife and make it easy to catch when it returns to your hand.

<document level="2" id="action-888" />

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Spellender
